verses.verse: This <S%G3778><s%> Now, <S%G2235><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> A Second <S%G1208><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> I Write <S%G1125><s%> Epistle, <S%G1992><s%> In Both <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Stir Up <S%G1326><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Putting You In Remembrance <S%G5280><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pure <S%G1506><s%> Mind, <S%G1271><s%>

To Be Mindful <S%G3415><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spoken Before <S%G4280><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> By Us <S%G2257><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saviour; <S%G4990><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Knowing, <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Will Come <S%G2064><s%> ' <S%G1909><s%> At The Close <S%G2078><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Mockers, <S%G1703><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2398><s%> Their Own <S%G846><s%> Lusts <S%G1939><s%> Walking, <S%G4198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise <S%G1860><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3952><s%> <S%G846><s%> ' Of His Coming? <S%G575><s%> <S%G3739><s%> For Since <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fathers <S%G3962><s%> Fell Asleep, <S%G2837><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Continue <S%G1265><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> Of The Creation. <S%G2937><s%>

<S%G2990><s%> For Is Hidden From <S%G1063><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> This, They <S%G5124><s%> Willing It, <S%G2309><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> Of Old, <S%G1597><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> An Earth <S%G1093><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> ' In <S%G1223><s%> Water <S%G5204><s%> Subsisting, <S%G4921><s%> By The <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%>

' Through <S%G1223><s%> Which Waters <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> With Water <S%G5204><s%> Having Been Deluged <S%G2626><s%> Perished. <S%G622><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> By His <S%G846><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Treasured Up <S%G2343><s%> Are, <S%G1526><s%> For Fire <S%G4442><s%> Being Kept <S%G5083><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> A Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Judgment <S%G2920><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Destruction <S%G684><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Ungodly <S%G765><s%> Men. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G1520><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But This One Thing <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Let Not Be Hidden From <S%G2990><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> With The <S%G3844><s%> Lord Is <S%G2962><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Years, <S%G2094><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1520><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> Does Not Delay <S%G1019><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Promise, <S%G1860><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Delay <S%G1022><s%> Esteem, <S%G2233><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Is Longsuffering <S%G3114><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> , Us, <S%G2248><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Willing <S%G1014><s%> For Any <S%G5100><s%> To Perish, <S%G622><s%> But <S%G235><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Repentance <S%G3341><s%> To Come. <S%G5562><s%>

<S%G2240><s%> But Shall Come <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Thief <S%G2812><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Night, <S%G3571><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> With Rushing Noise <S%G4500><s%> Shall Pass Away, <S%G3928><s%> <S%G4747><s%> And The Elements <S%G1161><s%> Burning With Heat <S%G2741><s%> , Shall Be Dissolved, <S%G3089><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Earth <S%G1093><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Shall Be Burnt Up. <S%G2618><s%>

These Things <S%G5130><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Being To Be Dissolved, <S%G3089><s%> What Kind Of Persons <S%G4217><s%> Ought <S%G1163><s%> To Be <S%G5225><s%> Ye <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Conduct <S%G391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Piety, <S%G2150><s%>

Expecting <S%G4328><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hastening <S%G4692><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G3952><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> ' By Reason Of <S%G1223><s%> Which The <S%G3739><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Being On Fire, <S%G4448><s%> Shall Be Dissolved, <S%G3089><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Elements <S%G4747><s%> Burning With Heat <S%G2741><s%> Shall Melt? <S%G5080><s%>

New <S%G2537><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> A New <S%G2537><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Promise <S%G1862><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> We Expect, <S%G4328><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Dwells. <S%G2730><s%>

Wherefore, <S%G1352><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Expecting <S%G4328><s%> Be Diligent <S%G4704><s%> Without Spot <S%G784><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unblamable <S%G298><s%> By Him <S%G846><s%> To Be Found <S%G2147><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Peace; <S%G1515><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Longsuffering, <S%G3115><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> Esteem Ye; <S%G2233><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Given <S%G1325><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All His <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Epistles, <S%G1992><s%> Speaking <S%G2980><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> These Things, <S%G5130><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Are Hard <S%G2076><s%> To Be Understood <S%G1425><s%> Some Things, <S%G5100><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Untaught <S%G261><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unestablished <S%G793><s%> Wrest, <S%G4761><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G3062><s%> Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2398><s%> Their Own <S%G846><s%> Destruction. <S%G684><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> Knowing Beforehand, <S%G4267><s%> Beware, <S%G5442><s%> <S%G2443><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lawless Ones <S%G113><s%> Error <S%G4106><s%> Having Been Led Away, <S%G4879><s%> Ye Should Fall From <S%G1601><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Your Own <S%G2398><s%> Steadfastness : <S%G4740><s%>

<S%G837><s%> But Grow <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In The Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saviour <S%G4990><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> To Him Be <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G1519><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Eternity. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
